name: Tuna Noodle Casserole
description: Some things never go out of style—starting with casseroles. From grandma’s kitchen to yours, we’re reviving retro with this creamy comfort meal. Skip the salty, canned soups in other recipes: Broccoli Cheddar Soup is sodium conscious, gluten free and, not to mention, heckin’ delish.

ingredients.name: Broccoli Cheddar Soup or Wintry Mushroom Soup

preparation: In a large pot, cook egg noodles according to package directions. Drain.
In a 9" X 13" baking dish, toss cooked noodles, soup, broccoli, and peas. Flake in tuna; stir to combine. Top with cheese.
If using, combine coating mix with melted butter. Sprinkle over casserole.
Bake 20–25 min, or until hot and golden brown.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.
